msg: Catching up on documentation (alas). Added bits for shale-dialog-scxml custom actions (redirect, view), application developer defined custom actions, DTD for dialog-config and authoring best practices. Also fixed a botched conditional in code. Includes docs for:

author: craigmcc
msg: [SHALE-374] Ensure that destroy() callbacks occur within the JSF lifecycle,
so that references to FacesContext.getCurrentInstance() will still work.  That
way, destroy() methods can still use JSF facilities to perform their cleanup
